allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Add-Type -AssemblyName ''System.Data.OleDb''; $excel = New-Object -ComObject Excel.Application; $workbook = $excel.Workbooks.Open\(\(Get-Item ''945246_소진_내역_2025-11-01_2025-12-31.xlsx''\).FullName\); $worksheet = $workbook.ActiveSheet; $data = @\(\); for\($i=1; $i -le [Math]::Min\(5, $worksheet.UsedRange.Rows.Count\); $i++\) { $row = @\(\); for\($j=1; $j -le $worksheet.UsedRange.Columns.Count; $j++\) { $row += $worksheet.Cells.Item\($i, $j\).Value }; $data += @\($row\) }; $workbook.Close\(\); $excel.Quit\(\); $data | ForEach-Object { $_-join '','' }")
